body:
So, I'm not entirely sure where to post this thread, so I'll post it here.

  I am looking for the staff requirements, I've browsed for about 30 minutes and haven't found anything.
If someone could possibly link me to them / comment them would be awesome.

     Thanks in advance.

title: Staff Requriments?

replies.body: When the staff applications are open they will tell you what you need to include in it. Then after they review it, they will tell you if you meet stff standards or not: I think you need to have over 24 hours of playing time and speak fluent english
replies.body_tagged: When the staff applications are open they will tell you what you need to include in it. Then after they review it, they will tell you if you meet stff standards or not: I think you need to have over 24 hours of playing time and speak fluent english

replies.body: As Tiger said when staff apps open, maybe in 3 months or so (Don't quote me on that), all of the information will be found in the "Staff Applications" section.
replies.body_tagged: As Tiger said when staff apps open, maybe in 3 months or so (Don't quote me on that), all of the information will be found in the "Staff Applications" section.

replies.body: Locking due to the question has been properly responded to.
